column1:
The overall sentiment for Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services, and General aspects in the given dataframe is as follows:

Cleaniness: 57.00%
Amenities: 64.51%
Location: 62.40%
Services: 62.91%
General: 64.28%

To improve these values, the following suggestions could be implemented:

Cleaniness: Increase the frequency of cleaning services, improve the hygiene standards, and provide appropriate cleaning materials.
Amenities: Provide better amenities within the premise such as internet, television, gym, etc.
Location: Invest in higher quality premesis in the central part of the town for higher visibility and easier access.
Services: Improve customer service by being more attentive to customersâ€™ needs and providing personalized customer service.
General: Utilize feedback from customers to improve services and invest in providing more services to customers.
